snippet.title: PC Longplay [458] The Typing of The Dead Overkill
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Spazbo4

The Typing of the Dead: Overkill, developed by Modern Dream, was simultaneously announced and released on Microsoft Windows on October 29, 2013. The game follows the same premise of the 1999 game, The Typing of the Dead, following the same storyline of Overkill: Extended Cut, but requiring players to type out words and phrases using a keyboard to defeat zombies as opposed to shooting them. The game also includes the Extended Cut version of House of the Dead: Overkill, playable with mouse or controller. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
